definition: to post (an item on a forum)
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
fitting snugly/appropriate/suitable/variant of 貼|贴[tie1]/to paste/to obey

sentences.english: Now the post has become an effective means of promotion.
sentences.chinese: 现在发帖子成为人们进行推广的一种有效手段。

sentences.english: In both cases the women accused of posting the profiles denied it.
sentences.chinese: 两个案子中，被指称发帖的女性都矢口否认。

sentences.english: Nobody will publish your guest posts, and nobody will link to you.
sentences.chinese: 没人会发表你的来宾发帖，也不会有人链接你。

sentences.english: Ahhh. Now go drink something strong, it's time to talk about posting.
sentences.chinese: 现在喝些提神的饮料，因为我们要开始讨论发帖了。

sentences.english: This is the story: about three years ago, they posted their the articles.
sentences.chinese: 那是三年前，他们在清地发帖子。

sentences.english: I was the only one who do not wish to post.
sentences.chinese: 希望不要只有我一个人发帖。

sentences.english: Postings are anonymous, which encourages users to give unvarnished views.
sentences.chinese: 发帖都是匿名的，这鼓励用户提出真实的观点。

sentences.english: Still go studying moss-grown person energy of life and hair post measure.
sentences.chinese: 还是去学习落伍的人气和发帖数量吧。

sentences.english: After the event, please post a follow-up activities will be reported.
sentences.chinese: 活动结束后，请及时将活动内容进行后续发帖报道。

sentences.english: The poster said they had suspicions of physical symptoms of AIDS.
sentences.chinese: 发帖者说，他们的身体出现疑似艾滋病症状。

sentences.english: In the body of post write amount of posts and your e-currency account.
sentences.chinese: 在帖子里注明你发帖数量和你的网银。

sentences.english: Postings to the new category would cost $10 and can be renewed for $5.
sentences.chinese: 新类别的发帖费是10美元，续期费是5美元。

sentences.english: Which is why today's posts are a bit less than usual.
sentences.chinese: 为什么今天的发帖数比平时的少呢？

sentences.english: His face looks familiar. Seems he was introduced before somewhere.
sentences.chinese: 小盆友有点面熟，好像以前发帖介绍过他。

sentences.english: Current, this sends Cong Mou of bloodguilty of post offer a reward to already was detained by public security on the net.
sentences.chinese: 目前，这位在网上发帖悬赏杀人的丛某已被治安拘留。

sentences.english: Please post it on Chinese forum.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想用中文发帖，请到中文论坛。

definition: to stick sth up (on the wall)/to post (on a noticeboard or website)
to reply to an invitation/(Internet) to post a comment on a forum topic
to seek new friends through personal ads, dating apps etc
Zhihu, Chinese Q&A website modeled on Quora, at zhihu.com, launched in Jan 2011
